coreAttributes.name: latex elbow-length glove
coreAttributes.description: A pair of latex elbow-length gloves. They're have a shiny look, and are silky-smooth to the touch.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the latex elbow-length gloves over [npc.her] [npc.hands], before pulling them up the length of [npc.her] [npc.arms].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the latex elbow-length gloves over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before pulling them up length of [npc2.her] [npc2.arms].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(forces)] the latex elbow-length gloves onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hands], before yanking them up the length of [npc2.her] [npc2.arms].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the latex elbow-length gloves down [npc.her] [npc.arms], before pulling them free from [npc.her] [npc.hands].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the latex elbow-length gloves down [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms], before pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] the latex elbow-length gloves down [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms], before roughly pulling them free from [npc2.her] [npc2.hands].
